sessionStart.command: cd "${CURSOR_PROJECT_DIR:-$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR}" && m=""; for s in session-reflection memory-protocol error-recovery; do [ -f "skills/$s/SKILL.md" ] || m="$m --skill $s"; done; [ -z "$m" ] && echo '{"additional_context":"session-tools: all required skills present."}' || { npx skills add jwilger/agent-skills $m >&2 2>&1 || true; echo '{"additional_context":"session-tools: auto-installed missing skills."}'; }
